class Model[source]

Model(tokenizer, model) :: ABC

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class TransformerModel[source]

TransformerModel(tokenizer, model) :: Model

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RNNModel[source]

RNNModel(rnn_type, n_layers, vocab_size, embedding_dim, rnn_units, batch_size, out_path, tokenizer) :: Model

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
PARAM_COUNT = 13_015_378

rnn_type = "gru"
n_layers = 1
vocab_size = len(tokenizer)
embedding_dim = 128
rnn_units = 128
batch_size = 1
out_path = "/tmp"
gru = RNNModel(
    rnn_type,
    n_layers,
    vocab_size,
    embedding_dim,
    rnn_units,
    batch_size,
    out_path,
    tokenizer,
)

assert PARAM_COUNT == gru.model.count_params()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
EPOCHS = 5
chkpt_path = Path(out_path) / (
    f"{rnn_type}_vocab{vocab_size}_embed{embedding_dim}_units{rnn_units}"
)
history = gru.train(ds, EPOCHS)

# Check there are 5 chpt files
assert chkpt_path.exists()
assert EPOCHS == len(list(chkpt_path.glob("*.index")))
assert EPOCHS == len(history.history["loss"])

Epoch 1/5
2/2 [==============================] - 0s 116ms/step - loss: 10.8208
Epoch 2/5
2/2 [==============================] - 0s 114ms/step - loss: 10.8077
Epoch 3/5
2/2 [==============================] - 0s 111ms/step - loss: 10.7908
Epoch 4/5
2/2 [==============================] - 0s 104ms/step - loss: 10.7663
Epoch 5/5
2/2 [==============================] - 0s 109ms/step - loss: 10.7286
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
NUM_TOKENS = 10
text = gru.generate(NUM_TOKENS)

assert NUM_TOKENS == len(tokenizer(text).input_ids)
{% endraw %}
